card.name: Tempest Magician
card.description: 1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner Spellcaster-Type monstersWhen this card is Synchro Summoned, place 1 Spell Counter on it. Once per turn, you can discard any number of cards to place 1 Spell Counter on a monster(s) you control for each card you discarded. You can remove all Spell Counters on the field to inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each removed Spell Counter.

card.name: Charge of the Light Brigade
card.description: Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard; add 1 Level 4 or lower "Lightsworn" monster from your Deck to your hand.
